name: Unicorn Hunter Elite - Sniper Season 2015
description: We all love unicorns right?? WRONG!! Not when they are evil and awful. Finally! We get to snipe Unicorns! Haven’t you always wanted to play a hunting game thats not duck hunting or even deer hunting?  The hunt is on in this hunter island hunter game. Grab your gun of choice and lets get your sniper shooter unicorn sniper assassin game on. See how many you can hunt and remember...Unicorns are not real! Not a good game for kids.
